title: Osprey-7 Medium Transport

Space Range: 1-3/12/25
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.5KM Damage: 3D (6D Fire-linked) == Capsule: == Starting out as a mid-rim company, Davishar Interstellar Technology entered into the mdeium transport race with a leap. For it's first two years of opperation, DIT developed replacement parts and engine systems. The Osprey-7 combines many elements to produce a sterdy and easy to modify freighter.
